      • getComboVisibleItemCount

        public static int getComboVisibleItemCount()
        Returns number of items that are visible in the drop down portion of the Combo list or -1 for default Combo value.
        Returns:
        the number of items that are visible
        See Also:
        setComboVisibleItemCount(int), Combo.getVisibleItemCount()

      • setComboVisibleItemCount

        public static void setComboVisibleItemCount(int comboVisibleItemCount)
        Sets the number of items that are visible in the drop down portion of the combo list.

        Note: This value will be set to all the combo which have binding. If set to other than -1, visibleItemCount set at the combo will be ignored.

        Parameters:
        comboVisibleItemCount - the new number of items to be visible
        See Also:
        getComboVisibleItemCount(), Combo.setVisibleItemCount(int), YRCComboBindingData.setVisibleItemCount(int)

      • getCustomControl

        public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getCustomControl(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                                                                 java.lang.String ctrlId,
                                                                 YRCCstmCtrlBindingData data)
        returns custom control for the provided control Id , if an implementation is found, null other wise. The custom control returned here is the child of parent composite, however, If parent Composite passed is null, custom control will be child of a newly created shell,
        Parameters:
        parent -
        ctrlId -
        data -
        Returns:
        custom control

      • getCustomControl

        public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite getCustomControl(java.lang.String ctrlId,
                                                                 YRCCstmCtrlBindingData data)
        returns custom control for the provided control Id , if an implementation is found, null other wise. The custom control returned here is the child of a newly created shell.
        Parameters:
        ctrlId -
        data -
        Returns:
        custom control
